operator.description: The operator between global variable and `compared_value`. Only used when `attribute_type` is `global_variable`.

compared_value.description: Compare the specified value to the variable's value. Only used when `attribute_type` is `global_variable`.

204.description: **HTTP Status Code:** `204`    Consumer routing profile's details updated.

400.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request **Error Code:** `4010`
Number of priorities exceeds the maximum limit.
**Error Code:** `4011`
The consumer routing profile has duplicated priority attributes.
**Error Code:** `4012`
The consumer routing profile's related resource not found.
**Error Code:** `4013`
Invalid `compared_value` or operator in the consumer routing profile.
**Error Code:** `4014`
Duplicate variables in the consumer routing profile.
**Error Code:** `300`
Missing required parameter.
**Error Code:** `303`
Invalid parameter.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found Consumer routing profile doesn't exist.

409.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `409`
Conflict Consumer routing profile's name already exists.

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](/docs/api/rate-limits/).

* Offline 
* Ready 
* Not Ready 
* Occupied

sub_status_name.description:
The user’s reason when the user status is `Not Ready`.

 To query a list of default and custom `Not Ready` reasons, call [List System Statuses](/docs/contact-center/apis/#operation/listSystemStatus) (filter by "queue_opt_out_and_not_ready_status" status_category)

 Default `Not Ready` reasons:
 * Break 
* End Shift 
* Forced 
* Meal 
* Meeting 
* Training

**Note**: Either `user_email` or `user_id` needs to be provided. If both `user_email` and `user_id` are provided, only `user_id` will be used, while `user_email` will be ignored.

The template ID must correspond to a template with a status of `Active` and a type of `Update`.If you provide this value, leave all other fields blank to apply the settings from the template. Only the settings from the template indicated as 'override' will be applied to the user. If you specify both individual values and a template in the request, the individual values take priority over the template settings.

*`premium` - Zoom Contact Center Premium or Zoom Contact Center Concurrent Premium Package.
*`elite`   Zoom Contact Center Elite or Zoom Contact Center Concurrent Elite Package.

add_ons_plan.description:

post.description:

template_type.description:
The user template's type.

* `add`: It is used to create users.

* `update`: It is used to update users.

selected_blocks.description:
User template Select the settings you want to apply.

It is only used for `update` type templates.

We can choose which settings take effect when applying.

For `update` template, it is required.

role.description:
The role's ID.

For `update` template, it is not required if it is not selected to be applied.

package_name.description:
The Zoom Contact Center plan to assign to the user. 
Concurrent or non-concurrent depends on the plan type purchased by the account.

`essentials` - Zoom Contact Center Essentials or Zoom Contact Center Concurrent Essentials Package.
`premium` - Zoom Contact Center Premium or Zoom Contact Center Concurrent Premium Package.
`elite` - Zoom Contact Center Elite or Zoom Contact Center Concurrent Elite Package.

For `update` template, it is not required if it is not selected to be applied.

add_ons_plan.description:
This is an optional field. The Zoom Contact Center plan to assign to the user. Concurrent or non-concurrent depends on the plan type purchased by the account.

get.description:
Retrieve a user's profile information.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `contact_center_user:read:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `contact_center:read:user:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The user's ID.

client_integration_name.description: The client integration connection name to be assigned to the user.

status_name.description:
The user's [availability status](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/4470584918541-Setting-availability-status). 
* Offline (ID = `0`) 
* Ready (ID = `1`) 
* Not Ready (ID = `2`) 
* Occupied (ID = `3`) 
* A custom user status (ID = `4`), such as "Lunch" or "Away until Monday"

sub_status_id.description: The user's reason ID when the user status is `Not Ready`.

sub_status_name.description:
The user's reason when the user status is `Not Ready`.

 To query a list of default and custom `Not Ready` reasons, call [List System Statuses](/docs/contact-center/apis/#operation/listSystemStatus) (filter by `queue_opt_out_and_not_ready_status` status_category)

 Default `Not Ready` reasons:
 * Break (ID = `20`) 
* Meal (ID = `21`) 
* Training (ID = `22`) 
* Meeting (ID = `23`) 
* End Shift (ID = `24`) 
* Forced (ID = `25`)

user_access.description:
The user's access status. 
* `active` - The user's role permissions allow them to access the Contact Center. 
* `inactive` - The user cannot access the Contact Center.

enable.description: Whether to allow users to receive voice or video engagements while handling chat and SMS engagements, based on the `max_agent_load` value.

max_agent_load.description: If the `multi_channel_engagements` value is `true`, this is the maximum load percentage that a user needs to take in order to receive voice and video calls. This value is based on the engagements the user is currently handling.

email_max_agent_load.description: If the `multi_channel_engagements` value is `true`, this is the maximum load percentage that a user needs to take in order to receive voice and video calls. This value is based on the engagements the user is currently handling.

multi_channel_engagements.description: Information about the setting's multi-channel engagements.

concurrent_message_capacity.description: The maximum number of concurrent messaging conversations that can be assigned to a user.

concurrent_email_capacity.description: The maximum number of concurrent email conversations that can be assigned to a user.

package_name.description:
The Zoom Contact Center Plan to assign to the user. Concurrent or non-concurrent depends on the plan type purchased by the account.
*`essentials` - Zoom Contact Center Essentials or Zoom Contact Center Concurrent Essentials Package.
*`premium` - Zoom Contact Center Premium or Zoom Contact Center Concurrent Premium Package.
*`elite` - Zoom Contact Center Elite or Zoom Contact Center Concurrent Elite Package.

add_ons_plan.description:
The Zoom Contact Center plan to assign to the user.C oncurrent or non-concurrent depends on the plan type purchased by the account.
*`ai_expert_assist` - Zoom Contact Center AI Expert Assist or Zoom Contact Center AI Expert Assist Concurrent Package.
*`zoom_contact_center_for_service_cloud_voice` - Zoom Contact Center for Salesforce Voice or Zoom Contact Center for Salesforce Voice Concurrent Package.

user_access.description:
The user's access status. 
* `active` — The user's role permissions allow them to access the Contact Center. 
* `inactive` — The user cannot access the Contact Center.

enable.description: Whether to allow users to receive voice or video engagements while handling chat and SMS engagements, based on the `max_agent_load` value.

max_agent_load.description: If the `multi_channel_engagements` value is `true`, this is the maximum load percentage that a user needs to take in order to receive voice and video calls. This value is based on the engagements the user is currently handling.

email_max_agent_load.description: If the `multi_channel_engagements` value is `true`, this is the maximum load percentage that a user needs to take in order to receive voice and video calls. This value is based on the engagements the user is currently handling.

multi_channel_engagements.description: Information about the settings' multi-channel engagements.

concurrent_message_capacity.description: The maximum number of concurrent messaging conversations that can be assigned to a user.

concurrent_email_capacity.description: The maximum number of concurrent email conversations that can be assigned to a user.

template_id.description: To retrieve the template ID, call the **List User's Templates** API. The template ID must correspond to a template with a status of `Active` and a type of `Update`. If you provide the update-type template value, leave all other fields blank to apply all settings from the template. If you provide this value, leave all other fields blank to apply the settings from the template. Only the settings from the template indicated as 'override' will be applied to the user. If you specify both individual values and a template in the request, the individual values take priority over the template settings.

package_name.description:
The Zoom Contact Center plan to assign to the user. Concurrent or non-concurrent depends on the plan type purchased by the account. An empty value will not assign the user to Zoom Contact Center.n*`essentials` - Zoom Contact Center Essentials or Zoom Contact Center Concurrent Essentials Package.
*`premium` - Zoom Contact Center Premium or Zoom Contact Center Concurrent Premium Package.
*`elite` - Zoom Contact Center Elite or Zoom Contact Center Concurrent Elite Package.

add_ons_plan.description:
This field is optional. The Zoom Contact Center plan to assign to the user. Concurrent or non-concurrent depends on the plan type purchased by the account. An empty value results in no changes.
*`ai_expert_assist` - Zoom Contact Center AI Expert Assist or Zoom Contact Center AI Expert Assist Concurrent Package.
*`zoom_contact_center_for_service_cloud_voice` - Zoom Contact Center for Salesforce Voice or Zoom Contact Center for Salesforce Voice Concurrent Package.

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `contact_center:read:list_user_queues:admin`

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of items returned per page.

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: The Contact Center queue's channel.

parameters.name: user_assignment_type
parameters.description:
User's Contact Center queue assignment types.
* `agent` - assigned as an agent in the queue.
* `supervisor` - assigned as a supervisor in the queue.
* `any` - assigned as either an agent or a supervisor in the queue.
* `both` - assigned as both an agent and a supervisor in the queue.

get.description:
Get a list of skills assigned to a given user. 

 

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `contact_center_skill:read:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `contact_center:read:list_user_skills:admin`

parameters.description: The user's ID.

parameters.name: skill_category_id
parameters.description: The skill category's ID.

parameters.name: skill_type
parameters.description: The skill category's type.

schema.description:
The skill category's type. 
* 'text' - A text-based skill, such as a geographic location. Skills in this category do not have assigned skill levels. 
* 'proficiency' - A proficiency-based skill, such as a second language. Skills in this type of category have assigned proficiency levels.

post.description:
Assign [skills](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/4423986613261) to a user. Skills are user traits that ensure that a given agent is the best person to handle a given customer interaction. Proficiency ratings indicate the user's level of expertise or knowledge of that skill. 

 

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `contact_center_skill:write:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `contact_center:write:user_skill:admin`

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The start time and date in `yyyy-mm-dd` or ISO 8601 format, `yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'` or `yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'TZD'`. The defined date range should be a month, as the response only includes one month's worth of data. If no start date is specified, return data from the past 24 hours.

post.description:
Create a new variable.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `contact_center_variable:write:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `contact_center:write:variable:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

address_book_ids.description: The address book IDs. Only valid when `variable_type` is `address_book_variable`, and cannot be empty.

use_in_reporting.description: Whether to use in reporting. Only valid when `variable_type` is `global_variable`.

mask_variable_data.description: Mask variable data, for sensitive information. Only valid when `variable_type` is `global_variable` and the value of data_type is not `boolean`, `date_time`, or `percentage`.

use_as_routing_profile_parameters.description:
Whether to use in the routing profile. Only valid when `variable_type` is `address_book_variable` and `data_type` is not `json` or `array`.
* `true` - Values are used as routing profile parameters.
* `false` - Not used as a value for routing configuration file parameters.

data_type.description:
The data's type. `variable_type:address_book_variable` only applies to data types with `*`. 
* `string` `*` 
* `number` 
* `boolean` `*` 
* `date_time` -(unix timestamp)
* `currency` 
* `percentage` 
* `email` 
* `url` 
* `phone` - ([E.164 format](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/E.164))

value_category.description:
The variable value's category. Only valid when `variable_type` is `global_variable`.
* `undefined` - Each engagement starts without a pre-set value. 
* `default_value` - Each engagement starts with the default value. 
* `linked_value` - The value links across flows, and each engagement uses the latest value.

values.description:
The variable's values. Take only the first value in the array when `variable_type` is `global_variable`. 
* If `variable_type` is `global_variable`, each value's max length is 4096. 
* If `variable_type` is `address_book_variable`, each value's maximum length is 300.

linked_value_lock.description:
The variable linked value's lock. Only valid when `value_category` is `linked_value`. 
* `true` - The variable can't be updated in a flow. It is the same for each engagement. 
* `false` - The variable value can be updated in a flow. Each engagement uses the latest value.

default_value.description: The variable's default value. Only used when `variable_type` is `address_book_variable` and `data_type` is `string`.

use_in_external_url_parameters.description:
Lets you use the parameter value in defining external URLs launched for each engagement. Only valid if `data_type` is not `json` or `array`.

* global

* address book

client_show_in_client_profile_section.description:
Whether this variable will be shown in the Zoom client's Profile section. Only valid if `data_type` is not `json` or `array`.

* global

client_show_in_client_engagement_section.description:
Whether this variable will be shown in the Zoom client's Engagement section. Only valid if `data_type` is not `json` or `array`.

* global

client_show_in_inbound_call_notification.description:
Whether this variable will be shown as an inbound call notification on the Zoom client. Only valid if `data_type` is not `json` or `array`.

* global

* address book

address_books.description: The address book list. This field is only returned when `variable_type` is `address_book_variable`.

total_contacts.description: The address book's total number of contacts.

mask_variable_data.description: Mask variable data, for sensitive information.

use_as_routing_profile_parameters.description:
Whether to use in the routing profile. 
* `true` - Values used as routing profile parameters.
* `false` - Not used as a value for routing configuration file parameters.

value_category.description:
The variable value's category. Returned only if `variable_type` is `global_variable`. 
* `undefined` - Each engagement starts without a pre-set value. 
* `default_value` - Each engagement starts with the default value. 
* `linked_value` - The value links across flows, and each engagement uses the latest value.

linked_value_lock.description:
The variable linked value's lock. 
* `true` - The variable can't be updated in a flow. It is the same for each engagement. 
* `false` - the variable value can be updated in a flow. Each engagement will use the latest value.

use_in_external_url_parameters.description:
Lets you use the parameter value in defining external URLs launched for each engagement. 

* global
* address book

client_show_in_client_profile_section.description:
Whether this variable will be shown in the Zoom client's Profile section.
* global

client_show_in_client_engagement_section.description:
Whether this variable will be shown in the Zoom client's Engagement section.
* global

client_show_in_inbound_call_notification.description:
Whether this variable will be shown as an inbound call notification on the Zoom client.
* global
* address book

linked_value_lock.description:
The variable linked value's lock. 
* `true` - The variable cannot be updated in a flow. it will be the same for each engagement. 
* `false` - the variable value can be updated in a flow. each engagement will use the latest value.

client_show_in_inbound_call_notification.description: Whether this variable will be shown as an inbound call notification on the Zoom client. Variable types: global, address book

parameters.name: variableId
parameters.description: The variable's ID.

address_book_ids.description: The address book IDs. Only valid when `variable_type:address_book_variable`.

use_in_reporting.description: Whether to use in reporting. Only valid when `variable_type:global_variable`.

mask_variable_data.description: Mask variable data (for sensitive information). Only valid when `variable_type:global_variable` and the value of data_type is not `boolean`, `date_time`, `percentage`.

use_as_routing_profile_parameters.description:
Whether to use in routing profile. Only valid when `variable_type:address_book_variable` and `data_type` are now `json` or `array`. 
* `true` - Values used as routing profile parameters.
* `false` - Not used as a value for routing configuration file parameters.

data_type.description:
The data's type. `variable_type:address_book_variable` only applies to data types with `*`
* `string` `*` 
* `number` 
* `boolean` `*` 
* `date_time` -(unix timestamp)
* `currency` 
* `percentage` 
* `email` 
* `url` 
* `phone` - ([E.164 format](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/E.164))

value_category.description:
The variable value's category. Only valid when `variable_type:global_variable`. 
* `undefined` - Each engagement starts without a pre-set value. 
* `default_value` - Each engagement starts with the default value. 
* `linked_value` - The value links across flows, and each engagement uses the latest value.

values.description:
The variable's values. Take only the first value in the array when `variable_type` is `global_variable`. 
* If `variable_type` is `global_variable`, each value's max length is 4096. 
* If `variable_type` is `address_book_variable`, each value's max length is 300.

linked_value_lock.description:
The variable linked value's lock. Only valid when `value_category:linked_value`. 
* `true` - The variable cannot be updated in a flow. it will be the same for each engagement. 
* `false` - The variable value can be updated in a flow. each engagement will use the latest value.

default_value.description: The variable's default value. Only used when `variable_type:address_book_variable` and `data_type:string`.

use_in_external_url_parameters.description:
Lets you use the parameter value in defining external URLs launched for each engagement. Only valid if `data_type` is not `json` or `array`. 
Variable types: global, address book

client_show_in_client_profile_section.description: Whether this variable will be shown in the Zoom client's Profile section. Only valid if `data_type` is not `json` or `array`. Variable types: global

client_show_in_client_engagement_section.description:
Whether this variable will be shown in the Zoom client's Engagement section. Only valid if `data_type` is not `json` or `array`. 
Variable types: global

client_show_in_inbound_call_notification.description:
Whether this variable will be shown as an inbound call notification on the Zoom client. Only valid if `data_type` is not `json` or `array`. 
Variable types: global, address book
